job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongNote strongDecentrix will only consider candidates that are Colorado residents We are all working from home until it is totally safe to return to our officesppbrppstrongAbout DecentrixstrongppDecentrix is growing its topnotch engineering team We are looking for strongSoftware Engineersstrong that love to solve challenging problems in a fun and collaborative environment as we build the next generation of optimization products for the media industry The products we build help our clients increase revenue by finding the most optimal way to buy sell and price their inventory See wwwdecentrixcom for more information about what we doppbrppstrongThe jobstrongppDecentrix is offering an exciting opportunity to an individual with the right skill set and background to join our elite team and work with the most advanced Media Advertising EnhancementOptimization Technologies You would be using your business technical amp development skills in an extremely fast paced environment providing services to forward thinking media corporationsppbrppDecentrix is not able to sponsor H1B applicants at this timeppbrpp Please apply strongemonlyemstrong if you are currently a strongColorado resident and a US Citizenstrong or Green Card permanent resident willing to work in an office environment in downtown Denver albeit when it is safe for us all to return to the officeppbrppSalary is dependent on experienceppbrppstrongNonColorado applicants will not be reviewed or responded tostrongp
